description:
Subaru returns to the convenience store... and this time Emilia stands behind the counter! It`s the situation he`s been waiting for!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 12 - --Kae
